question: I am  a juvenile  diabetic patient for the past 25 years.Now I anm 33 years old.I am expecting my second baby-30 weeks. I am on treatment of Novorapid and Insulatard. The doses  are as follows.Morning   Novorapid  30   Insulatard   32Afternoon                 18Evening                    22                     23Earlier my blood sugar was under control. But now my fasting  goes very high to 230-250 range.At 3 am , the blood sugar is about 150-170 I would like tl know whether there is any problem in using Novorapid during this period? What should i do to lower my fasting  blood sugar?
title: diabetes & pregnancy
